pages.text: To limit the rate of flow, a valve can be used. The valve has an interface to select a flow rate from 0 to 50000 l/h, 50000 is the default value.$(br2)When pumps are used in parallel to one valve, the valve still allows at most a flow rate of 50000 l/h, redirecting the remaining flow to any other apparatus without valves, if present.
The valve's flow rate setting is redstone controllable, the sensor receiver can be used directly on the valve.
